panels.description:
Green: signal active,
Orange: signal inactive,
Red: no signal
panels.title: Dish Signal Availability

targets.expr:
count(signal_data_rate_b_per_s{signal_direction="down", station_name=~"$stations", dish_name=~"$dishes", signal_activity="true", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"}) by (dish_name)
or (group(dish_array_bool) by (dish_name) - 1)

panels.title: Number of Downlink Signals per Dish

targets.expr: count(signal_data_rate_b_per_s{signal_direction="down", station_name=~"$stations", dish_name=~"$dishes", signal_activity="true", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"}) by (station_name)

panels.description: Micro gaps appear due to cut off in visualization
panels.title: Count of Dish Activities

targets.expr:
sum_over_time(label_join(count(dish_wind_speed_km_per_h{dish_name=~"$dishes", station_name=~"$stations"}) by (dish_activity, dish_name, station_name), "ground", "_" , "station_name", "dish_name")[$__interval:5s])
or 
sum_over_time(label_replace(count(dish_wind_speed_km_per_h{station_name=~"$stations"}) by (dish_activity, station_name), "ground", "$1" , "station_name", "(.*)")[$__interval:5s])

sum without (dish_name) (label_replace(avg(dish_wind_speed_km_per_h{dish_name=~"$dishes", station_name=~"$stations"} > 0) by (dish_name), "ground", "$1" , "dish_name", "(.*)"))
or
sum without (station_name) (label_replace(avg(dish_wind_speed_km_per_h{dish_name=~"$dishes", station_name=~"$stations"} > 0) by (station_name), "ground", "$1" , "station_name", "(.*)"))

panels.description: Only for dish activity "Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"

targets.expr: avg(dish_azimuth_angle_degrees{station_name=~"$stations", dish_name=~"$dishes", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"}) by (dish_name)

panels.title: Dish Azimuth Angle per Dish - $stations

panels.description: Only for dish activity "Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"

targets.expr: avg(dish_elevation_angle_degrees{station_name=~"$stations", dish_name=~"$dishes", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"}) by (dish_name)

panels.title: Dish Elevation Angle per Dish - $stations

panels.description:
Size: Data Rate,
Color: Target ID

targets.expr: dish_azimuth_angle_degrees{station_name=~"$stations",dish_name=~"$dishes", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"} + on(dish_name,  dish_activity) group_right(target_id) (signal_data_rate_b_per_s * 0) != 180

dish_elevation_angle_degrees{station_name=~"$stations",dish_name=~"$dishes", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command"} + on(dish_name,  dish_activity) group_right(target_id) (signal_data_rate_b_per_s * 0) != 90 != 88
signal_data_rate_b_per_s{station_name=~"$stations",dish_name=~"$dishes", dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command", signal_activity="true"}

panels.title: Data rate per Dish Direction - $stations

targets.expr: sum(signal_data_rate_b_per_s{dish_activity="Spacecraft Telemetry, Tracking, and Command", signal_activity="true", station_name=~"$stations", dish_name=~"$dishes"}) by (dish_name)
